comment.body: why should i make it look like an app? Dies ZeroNet work on mobile devices ?
@Styromaniac: my zite is responsive and should work on all resolutions well  ^^
@Styromaniac: whats the improvement if i change my RESPONSIVE zite to something like this? I dont get it.  o_0

open my zite and make it smaller in size  ... it will change the design for laptop & smartphone size  ... the icon is set by favicon.icon  ... yes it dont delete the field for the URL  ... but who will get rid of it, its the most easy way to check your own "security" cause you know where you are at  ...  still dont get it, seems like i am missing something.  ^^

@Styromaniac: All people i know use shortcuts or other featured the OS / Browser supports, why should anybody retype an URL you visit regularly. On ZeroNet all Sites are listed in the Sidebar too  ... maybe i am too old or too german to understand why i should do something like this, but i really dont get it. It just sounds like more code that make my website less usable without anything anybody needs  xD
Welcome to ZeroNet. You should publish in english to make more people follow. Look at the stats, maybe 20 users speak France  ;)

@Styromaniac: i love to create or try code to make my website better. But its like driving your car every day with a car trailer, even when you dont need it, just because your car can do it ... it just raise the gas mileage ... no need for it on every route.  ^^
